name: Disciple of Life
description: Whenever you use a spell to restore hit points to a creature, the creature regains additional hit points equal to your level + the spell's level.

name: Healing Aura
description: You can emit an aura of healing energy as a bonus action, restoring hit points to all creatures within a 10-foot radius of you. The hit points restored is equal to your level.

name: Life Link
description: When you cast a healing spell, you can choose to divide the healing among any number of creatures within range, including yourself.

name: Revitalizing Strike
description: When you hit a creature with a weapon attack, you can choose to restore hit points to yourself or an ally within 5 feet of the creature, equal to half the damage dealt by the attack.

name: Inspiring Leader
description: On a successful long rest, you heal your party members for an amount equal to your level + Charisma modifier.
